summary: A satanist cult leader is burnt alive by the local church. He vows to come back to hunt down and enslave every descendant of his congregation, by the power of the book of blood contracts, in which they sold their souls to the devil.
cast: Ernest Borgnine|Eddie Albert|Ida Lupino|William Shatner|Keenan Wynn|Tom Skerritt|Joan Prather|Woody Chambliss|John Travolta|Claudio Brook|Lisa Todd|George Sawaya|Erika Carlsson|Tony Cortez|Anton LaVey|Diane LaVey|Robert Wallace
title: La lluvia del diablo
